embed.empty_description: No users in this voice channel.

menu.join_description: Moves you to this voice channel
menu.bring_all_description: Moves all non-mod users to your channel

errors.guild_only: This command only works in servers.
errors.permission_denied: You don't have permission to use this action.
errors.move_failed: Could not move you. Are you in a voice channel?
errors.not_in_voice: You are not in a voice channel.
errors.target_not_in_voice: User is not in a voice channel.
errors.move_user_failed: Could not move user. Check permissions and hierarchy.
errors.no_non_mods: No non-moderator users in that channel.
errors.move_some_failed: Could not move some users. Check permissions.
errors.mute_state_failed: Could not change mute state. Check permissions and hierarchy.
errors.all_already_muted: All non-moderator users are already muted.
errors.mute_some_failed: Could not mute some users. Check permissions.
errors.no_muted: No muted users in that channel.
errors.unmute_some_failed: Could not unmute some users. Check permissions.
errors.command_guild_only: You didn't specify a channel and you're not in any voice channel.
errors.not_voice_channel: The specified channel is not a voice channel.
errors.no_users_in_channel: No users in that voice channel.
errors.user_not_found_guild: Could not find that user in the server.
errors.user_not_in_voice: {tag} is not in any voice channel.

mod.permission_denied_main: You don't have permission. Requires `MuteMembers` or `MoveMembers`.
